message: The paper discusses a Pausless Garbage Collection that is currently used inside Azul Systems Zing VM.
There are also some nice interviews with Cliff Click and Gil Tene. http://www.infoq.com/interviews/click-gc-azul http://www.infoq.com/interviews/gil-tene-azul-zing
And it seems that some of the improvements they made for the Zing VM are also being ported back to OpenJDK http://www.infoq.com/news/2010/06/zing http://www.managedruntime.org/
